KUBO

by Seiji, dale_coop

Released Sep 1, 2018
Players 1
Tags adventure, NESMaker
License CC BY 4.0

Download ROM (sha-1: 34a5d912ef34476ff7e358b9d7eeff5e93711953)

Description

KUBO, the story of a cowboy turtle on his quest for a mysterious crystal hidden in a dangerous world, full of monsters.

It's a 1 level game. You beat the monsters, you find the crystal, you win.

Created by a 6yo boy (Seiji), this game is a son & father's summer 8bit project (using NESMaker).

Screenshots
